comparison_summary: Summary 1 and Summary 2 both cover a 7-day period of web analytics, tracking similar key metrics such as sessions, users, pageviews, and revenue. Summary 2 shows a slightly higher average number of sessions and transactions, and notably higher revenue and conversion rates, while Summary 1 has a longer average session duration and higher user numbers.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Average Sessions
key_metrics_comparison.description: Summary 2 shows an increase in average sessions compared to Summary 1, indicating improved user engagement.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Average Users
key_metrics_comparison.description: Summary 1 reports a slightly higher average number of users than Summary 2.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Average New Users
key_metrics_comparison.description: Summary 1 reports marginally more new users on average compared to Summary 2.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Average Pageviews
key_metrics_comparison.description: Summary 2 reports more pageviews on average, suggesting increased interaction with content.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Pages per Session
key_metrics_comparison.description: Both summaries show a similar number of pages per session with a slight increase in Summary 2.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Average Session Duration
key_metrics_comparison.description: Summary 1 has a longer average session duration, indicating users spend more time per visit.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Bounce Rate
key_metrics_comparison.description: Summary 2 has a lower bounce rate, which suggests more visitors are engaging with multiple pages.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Conversion Rate
key_metrics_comparison.description: Summary 2 shows a significantly higher conversion rate, implying improved effectiveness in converting visitors.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Average Transactions
key_metrics_comparison.description: Summary 2 depicts a higher number of daily transactions, aligning with its higher conversion rate.

key_metrics_comparison.name: Average Revenue
key_metrics_comparison.description: Summary 2 generates more average revenue per day than Summary 1, possibly due to a higher conversion rate and transactions.

notable_trends: The most notable trend is the significant improvement in conversion rate, transactions, and revenue in Summary 2 compared to Summary 1, indicating overall enhanced business performance in the second period.
